title: Game Scoop Episode 616
description: Welcome back to Game Scoop!, IGN's original video game podcast. This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing the just-announced Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge. The team has more thoughts on Yakuza: Like a Dragon. A fan is pouring one out for the lost Start and Select buttons. And, of course, we play 20 Questions!
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
